EmailTemplate.description: Sends a letter to the customer when they get additional or upgraded Pervasive licenses.
EmailTemplate.name: IMC Pervasive Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I have been assigned work order {!Case.CaseNumber} to supply {!Case.Account} with X Pervasive Work Group Licenses. I have attached the spreadsheet which lists the workgroup license for Pervasive 12 and also the download link including the latest patches. Please ensure that when you apply your license key to a PC, that you make a record of which key you have applied to the laptop / tablet. Should your hardware fail, you will need to be aware of which PC was assigned the key in order to recover and reapply the key to another PC.
https://sfdownloads.tritech.com/perform/pervasive/pervasive%20v12/Workgroup/PSQL-Workgroup-12.10.011.000-win.exe
https://sfdownloads.tritech.com/perform/pervasive/pervasive%20v12/Workgroup/PSQL_Patch_WGE-12.11.025.000.exe
Please contact IMC Technical Support at 1-800-987-0911 option 4, if you have any questions on the Pervasive licenses.
Sincere Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} IMC Technical Support
